serviceOfferingName: Data Service Offering for Data Resource <Data resource name>
serviceOfferingDescription:
Data Service Offering provides data (<Data resource name>) securely through the Possible Dataspace software solution. The Data Product Service enables a secure data exchange between different organizations using the Open Source Software Eclipse Dataspace Component (EDC) Connectors which is based on the IDS standard (https://internationaldataspaces.org/publications/most-important-documents/). The Data Product Service is using a secured cloud service S3 bucket from IONOS to store data resources being sent or received.

Key Features:

1. Secure Data Transfer 

All data transfers are protected by encryption technologies to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the data.

2. Data Sovereignty

The connector ensures that the dataspace data product provider remains in control of which dataspace consumer can book (and then access) the data product.
